prompt: Pictorial description of the gluing formula for the heat kernel. The fat straight line to the left denotes $K(x,y|t)$, the thin straight line in the middle $K^{(1)}(x,y|t)$, a red squiggly edge denotes $\partial^n_u K^{(1)}(x,u|t)$. Blue wavy edges denote $\frac{1}{\sqrt{4 \pi t}}K^\gamma(u,v|t)$, green zigzag edges denote $K'(u,v|t)$. Grey vertices are integrated over the interface $\gamma$.
